1.name: Places around RPI
1.description: "Places around RPI" is a location quiz that tests your familiarity with the diverse spots near Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute. From campus landmarks to nearby hangouts, each question challenges your knowledge of the area's unique spots, making for an engaging exploration of RPI's surroundings. Whether you're a local or new to the area, this quiz promises a fun way to discover the places that shape the RPI experience.

questions.name: Blank Question
questions.description: Players can just skip this. Quiz makers can use this as an info slide.

questions.name: Match Question
questions.description: Players must find/take an image that as closely resembles the given image as possible.

questions.name: Location Question
questions.description: Users must pick a location on a map that best describes the image.

questions.name: Choice Question
questions.description: Users must pick the correct answer out of the options.

3.description: Call me Dottie, and you die.
